trans-unit.source: This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from application code.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen støtter infrastrukturen i .NET Framework, og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden i programmet.

trans-unit.source: A `SpeechHypothesized` event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: En `SpeechHypothesized` denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain detailed information about a tentatively recognized phrase by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner detaljert informasjon om et foreløpig gjenkjent uttrykk ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Numerous `SpeechHypothesized` events are generated as a recognition engine attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Mange `SpeechHypothesized` hendelser genereres som en recognition motoren forsøker å identifisere det angitte uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Behandler disse hendelsene er vanligvis bare nyttig for feilsøking.
